Descriptors: Participant was provisionally enrolled but not confirmed to have active pulmonary TB
Group notes \/ thoughts: Merged Cohort A and Cohort B reasons since they mostly overlapped (maintaining 1 code list is easier)

Descriptors: Participant was provisionally enrolled but was confirmed by a culture that was conducted on respiratory secretions obtained by bronchoalveolar lavage or bronchial wash
More than 1 week of anti-TB therapy was received before the required baseline sputum specimens for storage were collected
HIV test was not completed within the Month 1 Visit window
Met one of the following TB outcomes: Treatment failure, TB Relapse, Emerging Resistance
Physician decision (Investigator determines that further participation would be detrimental to the health or well-being of the subject)
Study terminated by funding organization or other government agency
Participant developed active TB (Cohort B only)
The required baseline biorepository specimens for storage were not collected

Group notes \/ thoughts: "B" for "before"
"A" for "after"
ND code updated on 8 Aug 2022. Old code ("87" removed)

Descriptors: Treatment failure (i.e. virological, immunological, and /or clinical failure)
Group notes \/ thoughts: From here to 17 matches IeDEA MEDRS codes (for future collab)
From here down  to 67.6 are IeDEA codes minus 30 (#-30), because otherwise we overlapped with the Unknown and Not in CRF codes used for RePORT

Descriptors: Pregnancy - switch to a more appropriate regimen for PMTCT
Side effect - any of the above not mentioned
Change in eligibility criteria (e.g. child old enough for tablets; refrigerator no longer available)
Regular treatment termination (used in tblMED e.g. for DAAs against HCV, antibiotics)
Change in treatment not due to side-effects, failure, poor adherence or contra-indication
Patient's wish/ decision, not specified above

Group notes \/ thoughts: Use ATC codes available here https://www.whocc.no/atc_ddd_index/  . We can compose a quick picklist of ATC codes based on what everyone finds in their datasets

Descriptors: Other blood glucose lowering drugs, excl insulins
Combinations of sulfonamides and trimethoprim, incl. derivatives
emtricitabine, tenofovir alafenamide, elvitegravir and cobicistat
emtricitabine, tenofovir alafenamide, darunavir and cobicistat
Anti-inflammatory and Anti-rheumatic products, non- steroids
TB Outcome Status: Bacteriologic status indeterminate
TB Outcome Status: Lost to follow-up/unknown

Group notes \/ thoughts: Use ICD11 codes available in searchable portal here https://icd.who.int/ct11/icd11_mms/en/release  . We can add more codes based on what everyone finds in their datasets

Descriptors: Tuberculosis of other systems and organs
Other specified malignant neoplasms of oesophagus
Carcinoma in situ of cervix uteri
Unspecified disorders of lipoprotein metabolism or lipidaemia
Pulmonary arterial hypertension associated with portal hypertension
Pneumoconiosis due to dust containing silica (Silicosis)
Respiratory diseases principally affecting the lung interstitium, unspecified
Stroke not known if ischaemic or haemorrhagic
